extendedInfo.description: Booze Brother is an alcohol diary.You enter the alcoholic drinks that you consume day by day and Booze Brother will convert this to the number of standard UNITS that you have consumed and these are displayed in a calendar format.All these UNITS are aggregated over the course of a week into a total weekly figure. This total number will be displayed in RED if you drink more than a set total for any week. This set total can be changed in the settings.

reviews.title: Easy and Intuitive
reviews.comment: Easy to use app, doesn\'t take to long to update your consumption. Calendar makes your drinking easy to see.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Do I drink too much!
reviews.comment: Easy to use, even when tipsy.  Great feature to be able to set your own unit level and the weekly calculation to show when you\'re over or under that figure (green for in and red for over!)
reviews.author: A Google User
